title: Geotechnical work at Blanchard St and Westlake Ave
description:
A notice shared to residents and businesses in Seattle's South Lake Union (SLU) neighborhood states that beginning March 10th, 2025, Sound Transit plans to conduct a geotechnical boring for soil analysis. The work is part of the planning phase for the Ballard Link Extension (BLE) project.

The location of the analysis will be conducted right across from the Whole Foods in SLU, nearby the highly debated future Denny station.

title: Train spotted at Federal Way Station
description: Light rail train #262 was spotted at Federal Way Station. Sound Transit has recently said they are nearing completion on the project, and trains at the southernmost point of the extension show that track work is mostly complete.
